content.raw:
It appears the transforms aren't being correctly published.  The transform to the odom frame is produced by the robot localizatio package.  Where you able to successfully run the command?

```
$ roslaunch wamv_gazebo localization_example.launch
```

If it fails, you might be missing the robot localization package (I was missing it, but verified that it is in the setup instructions)

```
sudo apt install ros-kinetic-robot-localization
```
